findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations may leave parties vulnerable to liability without recourse.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability to fees paid may not adequately protect against significant damages or losses.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party's liability under this Agreement is limited to the total fees paid hereunder.

findings.rationale: The absence of audit rights can hinder the ability to verify compliance with the confidentiality obligations.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The lack of provisions regarding intellectual property may lead to disputes over ownership or usage of ideas.
The Receiving Party being responsible for all attorney fees may dissuade them from pursuing legitimate disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: The Receiving Party shall pay all attorneys' fees and costs incurred by the Disclosing Party in enforcing this Agreement.
